response.original_title: In the Beginning was the Particle
response.overview: Documentary - It is the world's largest machine and consumes the same amount of electricity as a medium-sized town. Taking questions of this magnitude as its starting point, this documentary leads to a discussion between physicists and theologians regarding the role of chance, people's individual responsibility and whether, between all of these questions and answers, there is any room at all for God. Or indeed whether at this precise time modern Physics again sees a place for God in its world.
response.title: In the Beginning was the Particle
